resources.string: Jetpack compose tutorial is a modem toolkit for building native android ui . Compose simplifies and accelerates UI development on android with les code , powerful tools , and intuitive kolin APIs.

In this tutorial , you buuld a simple UI compoment with declarative functions. you call compose functions to say whta elements you want add the compose compilier does the rest. Compose is build around composable functions. These functions let you define your app\'s UI programmatically because they let you define you describe now it should look and provide data dependecies , rather than focus on the process oh the UI\'s construction , such as initializing an elememt and them attaching it to a parent . To create a composable function, you add the @Composable annotation to the function name.
Displays text and follows the recommended material design guidelines
create a composable thta lays ouit and draws a given painter class object
A layout composable that places its children in a horizontal sequence
A Layout composable that places its children in a vertical sequence
